医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
缺锌会增加肺部感染的风险饮食中缺锌会促进鲍曼不动杆菌引起的肺部感染；根据 11 月 15 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，这是呼吸机相关性肺炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632deafe-ba1a-41f6-80ab-a60b45f36748 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:36:45 -0500 Zinc deficiency linked to increased risk of lung infection
光脉冲有望控制癫痫发作加州大学旧金山分校、加州大学圣克鲁斯分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员利用光脉冲来预防神经元中的癫痫样活动，这有一天可能成为一种新的癫痫治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e3f081-c8d0-42a6-a0d0-8dd0ed201989 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:02:52 -0500 Pulses of light show promise in controlling seizures
怀孕期间的抗癫痫药物与儿童神经发育风险有关德雷克塞尔多恩西夫公共卫生学院研究人员的最新数据显示，在怀孕期间服用抗癫痫药物来控制癫痫发作和精神疾病的母亲所生的孩子可能会面临更大的神经发育疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac8597bd-9168-43e5-b5d0-a76d2c68c3dc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:20:14 -0500 Antiseizure medications during pregnancy linked to neurodevelopmental risks in children
研究人员发现突变如何破坏蛋白质剪接并导致疾病一个国际研究小组发现了一种对细胞蛋白质生产至关重要的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6612cf0a-7c94-4e08-88fc-55edd5013193 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how mutations disrupt protein splicing and cause disease
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
开发用于评估年轻女性维生素 D 缺乏风险的非侵入性低成本工具维生素 D 是一种必需营养素，通过阳光照射和某些食物自然产生。然而，过度的晒伤预防措施正在导致严重的维生素 D 缺乏问题，尤其是在日本的年轻女性中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Non-induced-low-cost-tool-development-for-assessing-risk-of-vitamin-D-deficiency-in-young-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Non-induced-low-cost-tool-development-for-assessing-risk-of-vitamin-D-deficiency-in-young-women.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=326e145c-149d-4f3f-afb3-221bc38da02b Fri, 15 Nov 2024 14:02:00 -0500 Non-invasive, low-cost tool developed for assessing risk of vitamin D deficiency in young women
糖尿病药物有望减少饮酒由诺丁汉大学专家领导的新研究发现，某些用于治疗糖尿病的药物可能有效减少饮酒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Diabetes-medication-shows-promise-in-reducing-alcohol-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Diabetes-medication-shows-promise-in-reducing-alcohol-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44df1559-cb54-4c14-bb0d-dc03a7c20ef0 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 13:55:38 -0500 Diabetes medication shows promise in reducing alcohol use
UT Health San Antonio 获得研究和临床医学全球最高排名吸引最优秀和最聪明的学生的竞赛已经成为一场国际竞赛，候选人不仅在自己的州或国家，而且在全球范围内权衡选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/UT-Health-San-Antonio-achieves-top-global-ranking-for-research-and-clinical-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/UT-Health-San-Antonio-achieves-top-global-ranking-for-research-and-clinical-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=beb23438-d96f-4f30-9007-e2afe468ee0c Fri, 15 Nov 2024 13:36:00 -0500 UT Health San Antonio achieves top global ranking for research and clinical medicine
最大的基于 ALS 患者的 iPSC 存储库开辟了研究新领域在一项具有里程碑意义的持续合作中，Answer ALS 和 Cedars-Sinai 宣布完成最大的基于肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 患者的诱导多能干细胞 (iPSC) 和生物数据存储库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Largest-ALS-patent-based-iPSC-repository-opens-new-frontiers-in-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Largest-ALS-patent-based-iPSC-repository-opens-new-frontiers-in-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70de19cb-ab16-4251-9d2c-711d412ac6a2 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 13:15:25 -0500 Largest ALS patient-based iPSC repository opens new frontiers in research
自 1990 年以来，全球糖尿病患病率和治疗差距不断扩大全球糖尿病发病率激增，尤其是在资源匮乏地区，这暴露了治疗获取方面的严重差距，并凸显了改善护理的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Global-gap-in-diabetes-prevalence-and-treatment-has-widened-since-1990.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Global-gap-in-diabetes-prevalence-and-treatment-has-widened-since-1990.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=659d6759-645b-4ebc-b855-9eab709693f9 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 07:58:00 -0500 Global gap in diabetes prevalence and treatment has widened since 1990
